trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There was one other sighting in Medford on or around October 28th 2007
Summary: Interdimensional, wobbling thing appears & moves in sky and disappears.
divs: sighting detailsit's about 5:50pm. i was bicycling down the same road i always go down...heading east. off in the distance, i saw something sort of translucent(but different) "wobbling" across the sky. initially, i thought it was like a puff of smoke....but smoke definitely doesn't move like that, and there wasn't any smoke in the area(or dark clouds). smoke\clouds don't maintain such definite shape either. the next thought i had was it might be something like a big piece of blackish mesh(or i guess some other kind of quazi-translucent material) that had been caught in the wind and was flying off. but again, it maintained consistent shape, and it disappeared....it also wasn't windy. i had pulled to the side of the road by now, to get a good look at it, and the same way it just faded into visibility, it faded out of visibility.... i am familiar with theoretical physics, and the concept of extra dimensions(as proposed by m-theory and string theory), so the best way i am able to describe how it looked was like it was from another dimension and somehow just began to slip through.... it didn't look solid(because of the translucency and texture), but it also did(in its definite outline and movements). i guess it sort of wobbled or something....like something in flight losing a little bit of control? being sort of disc shaped(sort of stereotypical flying saucer), it seemed to tilt on its side as it moved across the sky. i would also estimate it was two or three hundred feet in the air...but i'm not good with guessing that kind of thing. immediately after it went away, i was just puzzled about it...because i had no conventional explanation of what the hell it was. knowing damn well it was not from "this" world, i felt really ridiculous because ufo sightings happen to other people....not me. i just had to burst into laughter and rub my temples at the absurdity of what i saw.... i just kept thinking "this does not happen to me. *i* don't experience this crap" it just seems so ridiculous.... but that's what i saw. a fucking thing from another dimension, manifesting briefly in this one. jeez.
